description: NTS Map:92F11.  Beautiful forest/river loop from Stotan Falls to Comox Lake & back - well maintained trails for the most part, with minimal elevation change.
directions:
For Stotan Falls, take Piercy Rd. exit from inland Island Hwy., turn right at Plateau Rd., left at Duncan Bay main. To do the loop clockwise from Stotan head up the gravel road beside the penstock South of the river - the actual trail starts near the fish hatchery.  For counterclockwise travel, the trail starts at the concrete blocks North of the river.
Can also start from Nymph Falls or Upper Hatchery off Plateau Rd., or from the dam at Comox Lake.
title: Puntledge Loop
